product_name: Horny Toad Free Range Pants - Men's 30" Inseam - 2013 Closeout
long_description: Named the Free Range Pants because they can-and do(R)go anywhere, these 100% organic cotton trousers in a 30-in. inseam from Horny Toad hit the spot when chinos and jeans won't do. Organic cotton is breathable and easy care, and grown without the use of toxic pesticides. Ottoman weave gives the pants a subtle horizontal texture and is lightly brushed for softness. Classic zip-fly front with button closure and belt loops. Front reinforced slash pockets, 1 with pocket-in-pocket. Side phone pocket has a hidden snap closure. Back patch pockets are set onto the yoke seam. Closeout.
short_description: Named the Free Range Pants because they can-and do(R)go anywhere, these 100% organic cotton trousers in a 30-in. inseam from Horny Toad hit the spot when chinos and jeans won't do.
